channel.title: CVE Feed for Intel Corporation -- Active Management Technology
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Intel Corporation -- Active Management Technology

item.title: CVE-2017-5712|2024-08-05T15:11:48.603Z -- intel%20corporation -- active%20management%20technology
item.description: Buffer overflow in Active Management Technology (AMT) in Intel Manageability Engine Firmware 8.x/9.x/10.x/11.0/11.5/11.6/11.7/11.10/11.20 allows attacker with remote Admin access to the system to execute arbitrary code with AMT execution privilege.

item.title: CVE-2017-5711|2024-08-05T15:11:48.562Z -- intel%20corporation -- active%20management%20technology
item.description: Multiple buffer overflows in Active Management Technology (AMT) in Intel Manageability Engine Firmware 8.x/9.x/10.x/11.0/11.5/11.6/11.7/11.10/11.20 allow attacker with local access to the system to execute arbitrary code with AMT execution privilege.
